data.comment: The match has started at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, It's a goal kick for the home team in Getafe.
Throw-in Getafe.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 5, Celta Vigo are whistled for offside.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Getafe.
Goal! Getafe have got their heads in front thanks to a Damian Suarez strike.
In the minute 8, Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Throw-in high up the field for Celta Vigo in Getafe.
In the minute 10, Free kick Celta Vigo.
Getafe drive upfield and Nemanja Maksimovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Celta Vigo defender.
Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Celta Vigo.
In the minute 17, Goal! The away team are now level through a Iago Aspas penalty.
Celta Vigo to take a throw-in in Getafe territory.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Getafe a goal kick.
In the minute 20, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Celta Vigo needs to be cautious. Getafe have an attacking throw-in.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Celta Vigo's area.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
In the minute 24, Getafe are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Getafe have a goal kick.
Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
In the minute 26, Getafe have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Getafe close to the penalty box.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Getafe.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 31, Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Getafe have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 33, Getafe push forward at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez and Enes Ünal gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Celta Vigo defence.
Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Getafe Getafe's Cucho Hernandez is caught offside.
In the minute 37, Getafe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Celta Vigo in their own half.
Goal kick for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 39, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Getafe a goal kick.
In the minute 41, Celta Vigo have been awarded a corner by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Getafe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Getafe throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 44, In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Throw-in Getafe.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 48, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Celta Vigo.
Throw-in for Getafe in their own half.
In Getafe Getafe attack through Marc Cucurella. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 51, Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Getafe throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Getafe to check on Jeison Murillo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 54, Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Celta Vigo's Jeison Murillo looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 55, Celta Vigo are in shooting range from this free kick.
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez, Allan Nyom has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 57, Celta Vigo drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Getafe make their third substitution with John Joe Patrick Finn replacing David Timor.
Angel Rodriguez is on a sub for Cucho Hernandez for Getafe.
In the minute 57, Jaime Mata is replacing Enes Ünal for Getafe at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a throw-in for Getafe, close to Celta Vigo's area.
Throw-in Celta Vigo.
In the minute 59, Can Celta Vigo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Getafe's half?
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Renato Tapia for Celta Vigo who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Free kick for Celta Vigo in their own half.
In the minute 62, Renato Tapia for Celta Vigo is back on the field again.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo close to the penalty box.
Celta Vigo's Iago Aspas misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Getafe goal kick.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
Getafe to take a throw-in in Celta Vigo territory.
In the minute 65, Eduardo Coudet is making the team's first substitution at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez with Emre Mor replacing Miguel Baeza.
Celta Vigo have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick Getafe.
In the minute 67, Can Getafe capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Celta Vigo's half?
Free kick for Getafe in the half of Celta Vigo.
Jeison Murillo (Celta Vigo) has received a yellow card from Pablo Gonzales Fuertes.
In the minute 69, Celta Vigo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Celta Vigo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Getafe in their own half.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Getafe.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Getafe.
In the minute 77, Free kick Celta Vigo.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Goal kick for Celta Vigo at Coliseum Alfonso Pérez.
In the minute 82, Throw-in high up the field for Getafe in Getafe.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards Celta Vigo a goal kick.
The away team replace Nolito with Okay Yokuslu.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Celta Vigo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Celta Vigo.
In the minute 84, Damian Suarez for Getafe has been booked by Pablo Gonzales Fuertes and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In Getafe a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Nestor Araujo is booked for the away team.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a Getafe throw-in in Celta Vigo's half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Celta Vigo in their own half.
Celta Vigo have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Getafe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Celta Vigo's half?
At Coliseum Alfonso Pérez the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Pablo Gonzales Fuertes signals a free kick to Getafe in their own half.
Renato Tapia is back on the pitch.
Celta Vigo needs to be cautious. Getafe have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Celta Vigo in the half of Getafe.
Free kick Celta Vigo.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Renato Tapia.
Emre Mor (Celta Vigo) gets a yellow card.
Erick Cabaco is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
